Question.Subject: Why are some proxy sites unsafe?
Question.Content: Im not sure if i should use them or not because somebody told me they can be unsafe but they never said why?
Question.ChosenAnswer: They can log your account names and or passwords if you log into a site through them. If they do, they can use them for malicious purposes, or sell them. It is especially dangerous if you use a credit card through a proxy for the aforementioned reasons.
